channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (22 Jan 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Dhishna
item.dc:creator: Dhishna
item.description: Had a great time editing the guide. Sorry for the miss Wesley!
item.content:encoded: Had a great time editing the guide. Sorry for the miss Wesley!

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-01-22/#comment-286">Cathy Tibbles</a>.
Thanks so much Cathy, Dhishna did a great job.
And yeah, I just had to include Calvin's news!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Cathy Tibbles.

Thanks so much Cathy, Dhishna did a great job.

And yeah, I just had to include Calvin’s news!

item.title: By: Nick Davis

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-01-22/#comment-285">Shameem Reza</a>.
Thanks Shameem!

item.title: By: Cathy Tibbles
item.dc:creator: Cathy Tibbles
item.description:
This is my first time reading it - and I think its awesome!! A great way to stay on top of the important bits! Thank you for including the new baby - personal bits are important too!
Cathy
item.content:encoded:
This is my first time reading it – and I think its awesome!! A great way to stay on top of the important bits! Thank you for including the new baby – personal bits are important too!

Cathy

item.title: By: Shameem Reza
item.dc:creator: Shameem Reza
item.description: Good to know what happened this week in Genesis WP World. :) Some site are really awesome and worth to bookmark for future research.
item.content:encoded: Good to know what happened this week in Genesis WP World. ðŸ™‚ Some site are really awesome and worth to bookmark for future research.

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-01-22/#comment-283">Neil Gee</a>.
Thanks Neil (and apologies Wesley) there's so much going on this week that must've got overlooked!
Will amend it now (and appreciate the clarification).
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Neil Gee

item.description: Can't take credit for Atom Genesis Snippets, was just referencing it, that was done by @wesleymcole ?
